body: @minminazusa ty for the summary my king, this story seem awesome, really deserve a sequel, i really like these kinky vanilla love stories.

一応このような経験はあるけどねｗ
女の気持ちはわかる上男の気持ちも理解しているから、そのきっかけ読む後めっちゃ落ち込んでいるｗ

[rewording comment] After reading again, he probably got no choice. Asahi said he avoided relationship because it’s troublesome. As normal boy he like sex, but that’s not enough motivation for him to have a girlfriend. That girl who confessed to him sounds desperate, she asks him to be her boyfriend and she’s alright even if he doesn’t love her back. Normally that would have been a big red flag for him, but… maybe he’s also afraid she’s going to do something reckless like suicide if he rejected. | Author said this is supposed to be for commercial publishing job, but it’s cancelled, so she released it as doujin. No hints of sequel unfortunately.
Shit man, that ending really looks like a kick to the balls, but to be fair the cover gives a pretty good hint about the way things go; hope there is a sequel with a happier conclusion though.
I'm gonna keep it for now, looks interesting
Bro I feel so bad that they did her dirty bruh

The girl is likely in love because Asahi filled her loneliness, but she can’t say it. Asahi had told her, he think romance is too troublesome. Her previous boyfriends are like that too, and she ends up having sex with them to keep them with her, even if she still feel insecure about it. This time she wants to make sure it doesn’t fail. Only, an unexpected thing happened. Asahi got confessed (and quite a desperate one), and now with a girlfriend, he can’t just go to visit unknown girl’s place.| No idea if there will be a sequel, and it’s quite sad for the girl, because she is really lonely there, living alone.

It’s rather heavy. Either I missed it or the girl’s name is never mentioned. Asahi, the boy, found her collapsing on the street so he brought her home. Later they had a talk and she asked if he never got a girlfriend since he’s such a kind guy, but Asahi answered he never had any, and seeing people’s romance, it seems like something troublesome to do. But she offered him to have sex. At the end of their sex, he asked her if she had problems, which she answers him everyone got problem. After he went home, she felt lonely again. Next week, when he came to pick up his jersey he lended her, they ends up having sex again. It continue every time except when she is having menstruation, but he still come to her place.
damn, endings got me really curious. i hope for more!
This looks very interesting, a TL would greatly help understand, or at least a summary.
Yo? It was going so well tf happened? I NEED ANSWERS BRUV
